Articles.Content:
Rules:

- Use only views form cameras or kerbals.

- Outside view allowed only when there is at least one kerbal on EVA outside your vehicle, 100m or closer (only than you can control your vehicle in outside view).

- No engine burn when in map view.

Suggested mods:

- Hullcam - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/46365-0-23-5-Hullcam-VDS-Converted-DEA-to-MU-Updated-7-Jun

- Action Groups Extended - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/74195-Action-Groups-Extended-(Ver-1-6-Jun15-14)-250-Action-Groups-in-flight-editing

- Magic Smoke Industries - Infernal Robotics - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/37707-0-23-5-Magic-Smoke-Industries-Infernal-Robotics-0-16-2

Task:

1) Launch from kerbin with two probes.

2) One probe must land on the mun, second one must crash close to the first one (you need to get that on camera from the landed probe)

3) Second probe can only have monopropelant.

How to win:

Closest crash captured on camera wins.

Edited June 26, 2014 by Kiero
